results.content: It's helpful to realize that working with canvas is not so complicated, and to shape up your ideas. I have a complaint about the author code style,  it's a little bit messy. Beside that there is a lot of space for improvement of entire course.

results.content: I love the delivery of this presenter and will note his name.  A natural teacher is rare and I believe that he is one.  I'm not referencing robotic-like perfection, he makes mistakes, but eases you through those also.  This is one of few digital lectures that have been engrossing for me. Maybe because I have an problem, needing an immediate resolution, and have been exhausted by searching and trial and error.  After this, I'm sure I will be able to craft my own solution.  A very good feeling.

response.content: Thank you for the positive review and feedback - best wishes happy coding :)
